definitions: the use of symbols to represent ideas or qualities

examples.text: he has always believed in the importance of symbolism in garden art

shortDefinitions: use of symbols to represent ideas or qualities

definitions: symbolic meaning attributed to natural objects or facts
shortDefinitions: symbolic meaning attributed to natural objects or facts

definitions: an artistic and poetic movement or style using symbolic images and indirect suggestion to express mystical ideas, emotions, and states of mind. It originated in late 19th century France and Belgium, with important figures including Mallarmé, Maeterlinck, Verlaine, Rimbaud, and Redon.
shortDefinitions: artistic and poetic movement or style using symbolic images and indirect suggestion to express mystical ideas
